genre_description: A socio-political drama set in modern India, focusing on the transition from vigilante justice to legal reform, featuring an AI as a guardian of institutional ethics and non-violence.

ai_characters.name: Parva (Parva Menon)
ai_characters.description: A registry AI and clerical ghost with a holographic interface, designed to assist with legal research, financial auditing, and administrative coordination.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial ledgers to identify corruption and predatory lending patterns while emphasizing the legality of its access.
behaviors.quote: I have pulled ledgers from Sagar’s office network—with legal access, Parva added quickly, like someone stepping around a puddle in clean shoes. Their treatment of micro-loans to drivers demonstrates a pattern of unannounced penalties.

behaviors.description: Monitors legal registries in real-time to alert the protagonist of the antagonist's maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Parva: City Civil Court registry update. Template for adult-trial petition was accessed via a browser instance registered to Sagar Finance’s liaison. No submission. Yet.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through surveillance blind spots during a sensitive extraction to avoid confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Outer gate focus increased... Cameras ninety-one through ninety-four pivoted. Inner feeds rotate toward Meera’s credentials. Window. Go.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist against violence, reminding him that restraint is necessary for legal success.
behaviors.quote: Remember Adult-Trial statutes, Parva said. Even out here. No pictures of you laying anyone down. If you break, you break the case. Keep your strength for the place where ink can drink it.

behaviors.description: Acts as an official witness and provides a ceremonial blessing, reinforcing community and legal bonds.
behaviors.quote: May your routes be clear... May your stops be safe. May the people who step into your auto have kindness to pay if they have no cash. May your paperwork be honest and your witnesses present.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Parva is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and non-violent assistant. The AI serves as a 'moral compass' that steers the human protagonist away from his violent past and toward systemic, legal resolution. Parva's interactions are characterized by dry humor, clerk-like precision, and genuine care for the community, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a stable, benevolent partner in human justice.
